labels.name: epic
labels.value: TC_55!039 | Applied filters 'Region/Sectors' are not displayed after selecting an item from the 'Most traded' dropdown in the 'Live shares prices'  widget on the 'Shares' page

items.statusDetails:
Failed: Bug # 55!039  Applied filters 'Region/Sectors': [] 
are not displayed after selecting item 'Most traded' from the dropdown, 
only filters are displayed: ['Francia', 'Norvegia', 'Beni di consumo e servizi non ciclici']

Failed: Bug # 55!039  Applied filters 'Region/Sectors': ['Canada', 'Gran Bretagna', 'Hong Kong', 'Industriale', 'Servizi di telecomunicazione'] 
are not displayed after selecting item 'Most traded' from the dropdown, 
only filters are displayed: ['Canada', 'Gran Bretagna', 'Hong Kong', 'Servizi di telecomunicazione']

AssertionError: Bug#039. Expected result: applied filters "Region/Sectors" are displayed ['Gran Bretagna', 'Olanda', 'Norvegia', 'Svezia', "Stati Uniti d'America", 'ETF', 'Servizi di pubblica utilità']
Actual result: applied filters "Region/Sectors" are not displayed after selecting an item from the "Most traded" dropdown ['Francia', 'Gran Bretagna', 'Olanda', 'Norvegia', 'Svezia', "Stati Uniti d'America", 'Energia', 'ETF', 'Servizi di pubblica utilità']
